scripts.pack-project-one-typings: cd project-one-typings && npm run build-plugin cd ../
scripts.pack-project-two-typings: cd project-two-typings && npm run build-plugin cd ../
scripts.install-plugins: concurrently "cd project-one && npm install" "cd project-two && npm install"
scripts.pack-project-one: cd project-one && npm run packagr && cd dist && npm pack && cd ../../
scripts.pack-project-two: cd project-two && npm run packagr && cd dist && npm pack && cd ../../
scripts.build-all: npm run install-builder && npm run install-typings && npm run pack-typings && npm run install-plugins && npm run pack-plugins && npm run install-core && npm run install-electron
